long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Portentâ€™s SEO Page Review Chrome Extension is a lightweight browser add-on that reviews basic onsite SEO elements. It pulls the essential elements like Title Tags, Meta Description, Canonical tag, HREFLANG tags, on-page links, Open Graph, Twittercard, and all other meta data so you can quickly view the elements on the page.
